title: District 9 candidate for San Antonio council bows out
title_page: District 9 candidate for San Antonio council bows out
maintext:
One of the three people challenging John Courage for his seat on City Council has suspended his campaign and endorsed Courage in the contest.
Nicholas Balderas, a 24-year-old software developer, said on Twitter that fundraising challenges left him without a path to victory in the North Side’s District 9. Balderas did not raise any cash for his bid, according to a campaign finance report he filed last week.
Balderas will still appear on the ballot because he missed the deadline to officially withdraw.
Financial adviser Patrick Von Dohlen and personal trainer Richard Reza Versace are Courage’s remaining challengers.
Early voting starts April 22 and election day is May 4.
